result.execSummary:
The defendant Donald K Lee was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant must pay all outstanding fees and court obligations.  If supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.
No alcohol, random UA's at discretion of agent.

No controlled substances, random UA's at discretion of agent.  Do not associate with any known drug dealers or users.  Defendant may only take medication pursuant to a prescription.  No narcotics even with a prescription.

Complete Milwaukee Secure Detention Facility Alternative to Revocation.  Defendant must attend 3 self-help meetings per week and provide signed proof of attendance.  No contact with the victim (person, property, residence or family).  Counseling, treatment, services as deemed appropriate by agent. Defendant must obey all rules and regulations of probation.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: DOC-notice of court ordered financial obligations status - balance due on court ordered financial obligations $886.00.  Defendant due to discharge 09-23-2016.
records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Defendant does not plan on seeking postconviction relief.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 23, 2014 at 11:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 26, 2014 at 08:15 am.
Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.

Defendant Donald K Lee in court, in custody,  with attorney Jamie McClendon. Richard Chiapete appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 26, 2014 at 08:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on August 13, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with the victim (person, property, residence or family).  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Donald K Lee in court with attorney Michelle Marie Anderson.  Defendant Donald K Lee in custody.  Rebecca L Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 13, 2014 at 08:30 am.
